tool_description: Emoji Translator by AI - Convert Text 📜 to Emoji 🏆. This webpage transforms plain text into the immaculate emoji language. Use this Emoji Translator for Emoji copy and paste. Enter your text and this tool will convert the text into emojis with multiple emoji options. Emojiziter!
name: Text to emoji - API
title: Text to emoji - API

api_list.name: /text-to-emoji
api_list.description: Insert a input with text and transform it into a sequence of emojis.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com/text-to-emoji"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com/text-to-emoji"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
